an6.61:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava baranasiyam viharati isipatane migadaye.
an6.61:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulanam theranam bhikkhunam pacchabhattam pindapatapatikkantanam mandalamale sannisinnanam sannipatitanam ayamantarakatha udapadi:
an6.61:3.1: “Katamo nu kho, avuso, eko anto, katamo dutiyo anto, kim majjhe, ka sibbini”ti?
an6.61:3.2: Evam vutte, annataro bhikkhu there bhikkhu etadavoca:
an6.61:3.3: “phasso kho, avuso, eko anto, phassasamudayo dutiyo anto, phassanirodho majjhe, tanha sibbini;
an6.61:3.4: tanha hi nam sibbati tassa tasseva bhavassa abhinibbattiya.
an6.61:3.5: Ettavata kho, avuso, bhikkhu abhinneyyam abhijanati, parinneyyam parijanati, abhinneyyam abhijananto parinneyyam parijananto dittheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti”ti.
an6.61:4.1: Evam vutte, annataro bhikkhu there bhikkhu etadavoca:
an6.61:4.2: “atitam kho, avuso, eko anto, anagatam dutiyo anto, paccuppannam majjhe, tanha sibbini;
an6.61:4.3: tanha hi nam sibbati tassa tasseva bhavassa abhinibbattiya.
an6.61:4.4: Ettavata kho, avuso, bhikkhu abhinneyyam abhijanati, parinneyyam parijanati, abhinneyyam abhijananto, parinneyyam parijananto dittheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti”ti.
an6.61:5.1: Evam vutte, annataro bhikkhu there bhikkhu etadavoca:
an6.61:5.2: “sukha, avuso, vedana eko anto, dukkha vedana dutiyo anto, adukkhamasukha vedana majjhe, tanha sibbini;
an6.61:5.3: tanha hi nam sibbati tassa tasseva bhavassa abhinibbattiya.
an6.61:5.4: Ettavata kho, avuso, bhikkhu abhinneyyam abhijanati, parinneyyam parijanati, abhinneyyam abhijananto, parinneyyam parijananto dittheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti”ti.
an6.61:6.1: Evam vutte, annataro bhikkhu there bhikkhu etadavoca:
an6.61:6.2: “namam kho, avuso, eko anto, rupam dutiyo anto, vinnanam majjhe, tanha sibbini;
an6.61:6.3: tanha hi nam sibbati tassa tasseva bhavassa abhinibbattiya.
an6.61:6.4: Ettavata kho, avuso, bhikkhu abhinneyyam abhijanati, parinneyyam parijanati, abhinneyyam abhijananto parinneyyam parijananto dittheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti”ti.
an6.61:7.1: Evam vutte annataro bhikkhu there bhikkhu etadavoca:
an6.61:7.2: “cha kho, avuso, ajjhattikani ayatanani eko anto, cha bahirani ayatanani dutiyo anto, vinnanam majjhe, tanha sibbini;
an6.61:7.3: tanha hi nam sibbati tassa tasseva bhavassa abhinibbattiya.
an6.61:7.4: Ettavata kho, avuso, bhikkhu abhinneyyam abhijanati, parinneyyam parijanati, abhinneyyam abhijananto parinneyyam parijananto dittheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti”ti.
an6.61:8.1: Evam vutte annataro bhikkhu there bhikkhu etadavoca:
an6.61:8.2: “sakkayo kho, avuso, eko anto, sakkayasamudayo dutiyo anto, sakkayanirodho majjhe, tanha sibbini;
an6.61:8.3: tanha hi nam sibbati tassa tasseva bhavassa abhinibbattiya.
an6.61:8.4: Ettavata kho, avuso, bhikkhu abhinneyyam abhijanati, parinneyyam parijanati, abhinneyyam abhijananto parinneyyam parijananto dittheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti”ti.
an6.61:9.1: Evam vutte, annataro bhikkhu there bhikkhu etadavoca:
an6.61:9.2: “byakatam kho, avuso, amhehi sabbeheva yathasakam patibhanam.
an6.61:9.3: Ayamavuso, yena bhagava tenupasankamissama; upasankamitva bhagavato etamattham arocessama.
an6.61:9.4: Yatha no bhagava byakarissati tatha nam dharessama”ti.
an6.61:10.1: “Evamavuso”ti kho thera bhikkhu tassa bhikkhuno paccassosum.
an6.61:10.2: Atha kho thera bhikkhu yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidimsu.
an6.61:10.3: Ekamantam nisinna kho thera bhikkhu yavatako ahosi sabbeheva saddhim kathasallapo, tam sabbam bhagavato arocesum.
an6.61:10.5: “Sabbesam vo, bhikkhave, subhasitam pariyayena, api ca yam maya sandhaya bhasitam parayane metteyyapanhe:
an6.61:12.1: Tam sunatha, sadhukam manasi karotha, bhasissami”ti.
an6.61:12.2: “Evam, bhante”ti kho thera bhikkhu bhagavato paccassosum.
an6.61:12.4: “phasso kho, bhikkhave, eko anto, phassasamudayo dutiyo anto, phassanirodho majjhe, tanha sibbini;
an6.61:12.5: tanha hi nam sibbati tassa tasseva bhavassa abhinibbattiya.
an6.61:12.6: Ettavata kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu abhinneyyam abhijanati, parinneyyam parijanati, abhinneyyam abhijananto parinneyyam parijananto dittheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti”ti.
